attributes.additional_details:
Im creating this petition as a business and it will cost every single business around £6k extra annually.
So we asking to drop this increase and leave as it is to help businesses to survive and keep on moving forward.
attributes.background:
cancel Congestion zone increased fee
it will cost between 40 to 60 pounds extra on weekly basis .
current TFL proposal as from 22June 2020 every day Monday to Sunday 7am-10pm 
fee of £15/daily .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. Transport is the responsibility of the London Assembly and the London Mayor. 

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
